statements: SELECT * FROM crop_yield_prediction WHERE region='East'
SELECT region, year, crop_type, historical_yield FROM crop_yield_prediction WHERE year=2020
SELECT region, predicted_yield, crop_type FROM crop_yield_prediction WHERE crop_type='Corn'
SELECT year, predicted_yield, historical_yield FROM crop_yield_prediction WHERE region='West'
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_prediction WHERE historical_yield > predicted_yield
SELECT region, year, crop_type, historical_yield, predicted_yield FROM crop_yield_prediction WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY region ASC
SELECT region, year, crop_type, predicted_yield FROM crop_yield_prediction WHERE predicted_yield > 500 ORDER BY crop_type DESC
SELECT region, year, crop_type, historical_yield FROM crop_yield_prediction WHERE region = 'North' AND crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT region, year, crop_type, historical_yield, predicted_yield FROM crop_yield_prediction WHERE predicted_yield < historical_yield AND region != 'South' ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT region, year, predicted_yield FROM crop_yield_prediction WHERE crop_type = 'Soybean' ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT * FROM CropData;
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_acre FROM CropData ORDER BY yield_per_acre DESC;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, year_grown FROM CropData WHERE year_grown = 2020;
SELECT weather_id, temperature, rainfall FROM WeatherData WHERE date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_acre FROM CropData WHERE yield_per_acre > 30 ORDER BY yield_per_acre ASC;
SELECT * FROM CropData WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_acre FROM CropData WHERE year_grown >= 2020 ORDER BY yield_per_acre DESC;
SELECT MAX(yield_per_acre) AS max_yield FROM CropData;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(rainfall) AS avg_rainfall FROM WeatherData;
SELECT crop_name, year_grown, temperature FROM CropData JOIN WeatherData ON CropData.crop_id = WeatherData.weather_id;
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crop_data WHERE crop_name = 'Corn';
SELECT location, temperature, rainfall FROM weather_data WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT crop_name, predicted_yield FROM yield_predictions WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT id, crop_name, year, yield FROM crop_data WHERE crop_name = 'Wheat';
SELECT crop_name, year, yield FROM crop_data WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY yield DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, year, temperature, rainfall FROM weather_data WHERE location='California' AND temperature > 25 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT crop_name, AVG(yield) AS average_yield FROM crop_data GROUP BY crop_name HAVING AVG(yield) > 50;

SELECT crop_name, year, yield, predicted_yield FROM crop_data LEFT JOIN yield_predictions ON crop_data.crop_name=yield_predictions.crop_name AND crop_data.year=yield_predictions.year WHERE crop_data.year=2020;
SELECT MAX(yield) AS max_yield, MIN(yield) AS min_yield, AVG(yield) AS avg_yield FROM crop_data WHERE crop_name='Corn' AND year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM historical_weather;
SELECT temperature, rainfall FROM historical_weather WHERE date = '2023-01-01';
SELECT soil_type, ph_level FROM soil_conditions ORDER BY ph_level DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_data WHERE harvest_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, predicted_yield FROM crop_data JOIN yield_predictions ON crop_data.crop_id = yield_predictions.crop_id WHERE prediction_date = '2023-06-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_weather ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_data WHERE harvest_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT crop_name, predicted_yield FROM crop_data JOIN yield_predictions ON crop_data.crop_id = yield_predictions.crop_id WHERE yield_predictions.predicted_yield > 1000;
SELECT date, temperature, rainfall FROM historical_weather WHERE temperature < 15 ORDER BY rainfall DESC;
SELECT soil_type, ph_level FROM soil_conditions WHERE ph_level BETWEEN 6.0 AND 7.5 ORDER BY soil_id ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_data;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, planting_date, yield_per_hectare FROM crop_data WHERE yield_per_hectare > 5000;
SELECT fertilizer_name, nutrient_content, application_rate FROM fertilizers_data WHERE application_rate < 10;
SELECT date, predicted_yield_per_hectare FROM crop_yield_predictions WHERE predicted_yield_per_hectare < 3000;
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_hectare FROM crop_data
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT soil_type, ph_level, organic_matter FROM soil_data WHERE ph_level > 6.5
SELECT * FROM fertilizers_data WHERE application_rate BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date, predicted_yield_per_hectare FROM crop_data JOIN crop_yield_predictions ON crop_data.crop_id = crop_yield_predictions.crop_id
